name: Alessandro Baffa
bio: I love to write clean code and Go is a language created to be easy to understand and master. Despite I don't use it professionally, I closely follow its progress and amazing community.

name: Adrian Spanu
bio: I work as a software engineer full time. One of the larger codebases I work in is a set of microservices written in Go. I'm not an expert in Go, but I've started to figure out my way around it. Happy to help others trying to learn more!
